text:
Julie May Wilson (October 21, 1924 – April 5, 2015) was a American singer and actress. She was nominated for the Tony Award for Best Featured Actress in a Musical in 1989 for her performance in "Legs Diamond". She was born in Omaha, Nebraska.
Wilson died in New York City, New York from complications of a stroke, aged 90.

annotations.surface_form: Tony Award for Best Featured Actress in a Musical
